author: Peter Howell
title: Why Arrival could win Best Picture: Howell | Toronto Star
text: Key early kudos: BAFTA Best Sound Award; American Cinema Editors Best Edited Feature Film — Dramatic. Amy Adams and Jeremy Renner in Arrival. ( Jan Thijs ) Box office (domestic, U.S. dollars): $100 million. Ladbrokes odds: 100/1 Paddy Power: 100/1 Sky Bet: 100/1 Why it could win: It speaks to the need for patience and understanding regarding strangers in our midst, an urgent message for Trumpian times. Why it might not: No sci-fi movie has ever won Best Picture. The lack of a Best Actress nomination for Adams suggests the Academy views this picture as a technical achievement, not a dramatic one. Howell’s line: Arrival opens minds — but Academy ones are still snapped shut.
